div.p: Just a short update on current net status: yesterday we have had a new record day in lifetime of I2P. stats.i2p did show a new high of over 14.000 active router, and echelons news.xml fetch count did show a number of over 12.000 unique news.xml fetches per day. Despite this high number the I2P behave very well and tunnel built success did not drop below 50 percent. I2P does grow and can cope very well with this growth. The fixes in Version 0.8.12 did helped a lot.

The I2P project got a nice donation of 1500 € to setup a bounty of unit tests. Also a nice sum of 100 BTC was donated to the I2P bitcoin client bounty.
Get in contact with us if you think you can code one of these projects and claim its bounty (or another one of I2P bounties!

The 0.8.12 release fixes several serious message corruption bugs. It also contains a redesign of the router's congestion control, and continued optimization of CPU and memory usage. We are hopeful that these changes will improve network performance. Upgrading is recommended.

Say hello to the volunteers on the #i2p-help IRC channel. Get involved, spread the word, and donate! If you find a bug, please enter a report on trac. To help on translations, volunteer on IRC #i2p-dev or sign up on Transifex.
